Package graphics.renderer

Class RenderBatch

  • java.lang.Object
    • graphics.renderer.RenderBatch
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<RenderBatch>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DebugRenderBatch, DefaultRenderBatch, QuadRenderBatch
    public abstract class RenderBatch
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<RenderBatch>

    • Constructor Detail

      • RenderBatch

        public RenderBatch​(int maxBatchSize,
                   int zIndex,
                   Primitive primitive,
                   ShaderDatatype... attributes)
        Parameters:
        maxBatchSize - the maximum number of primitives in a batch
        zIndex - the zIndex of the batch. Used to sort the batches in order of which sprites appear above others.
        primitive - the primitive
        attributes - attributes for the Vertex array

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public void start()
        Create the GPU resources. Generates a vao, a dynamic vbo, a static buffer of indices and adds all buffers to the vao

      • loadVertexProperties

        protected abstract void loadVertexProperties​(int index,
                                             int offset)
        Load up a primitive to the data array
        Parameters:
        index - index of the primitive to be loaded
        offset - offset of where the primitive should start being added to the array

      • getOffset

        protected int getOffset​(int index)
        Calculates offset into the data array based on index of the sprite
        Parameters:
        index - index of the sprite
        Returns:
        offset into data array at which the sprites data has to be added

      • load

        protected void load​(int index)
        Function for calling loadVertexProperties but also sets up necessary stuff relating to uploading data to the gpu. Always prefer calling this function instead of calling loadVertexProperties()
        Parameters:
        index - index of the sprite to be loaded

      • addTexture

        protected int addTexture​(Texture texture)
        Add a texture to this batch
        Parameters:
        texture - the texture to be rendered
        Returns:
        the index at which texture is placed. The texture will be bound to this texture slot. Hence, set the texture attribute to this value.

      • updateBuffer

        public void updateBuffer()
        Update the buffer on the GPU but only if it is necessary

      • updateBuffer

        public void updateBuffer​(int spriteIndex)
        Update the buffer with a memory taken as a pointer from GPU and only update the sprite that needs updating
        Parameters:
        spriteIndex - the index of a sprite that needs updating

      • bind

        public void bind()
        Binds the vertex array and all the textures to the required slots

      • unbind

        public void unbind()
        Unbinds the vertex array and all the textures

      • delete

        public void delete()
        Delete the vertex array, vertex buffer and index buffer (element buffer)

      • getVertexCount

        public int getVertexCount()
        Get the number of vertices to be drawn
        Returns:
        the number of vertices to be drawn

        public boolean hasRoomLeft()
